original_text: So stood the two companies of them that gave thanks in the house of God, and I, and the half of the rulers with me:
korean_text: 이에 감사 찬송하는 두 무리가 하나님의 전에 섰고 또 나와 민장의 절반도 함께 하였고

sentences.original_text: So stood two companies of them
that gave thanks in house of God
and half of the rulers with me
